roleset.name: to hold or confine
roleset.note: IMPOUND-V NOTES: Frames file for 'impound' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from impound.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: passive
example.text: [More than 300 planes and helicopters]-1 have been impounded [*-1]at airports , and a large number of vehicles and launches has been confiscated [*-2] .
